title: Lies of Pro-LTTE Panelists exposed at Human Right’s Law Center – Australia
content: – By Shenali Waduge – The Human Rights Law Centre scheduled 2 events in Sydney and Melbourne 6-9March 2013 to highlight the alleged human rights issues against Sri Lanka vis a vis the conclusion of the war that was under speculation once more at the United Nations. Numerous appeals addressed to the HRLC Board stating…
